eddy.lang.parser

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • eddy.lang.parser.Parser

  • public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    Translates policy text into a Policy object. The architecture consists of ActionParser objects that are specialized for actions expressed in the language (e.g., COLLECT statements support the designation of a FROM role over the domain of Actor objects.) The parser can be extended to support parsing new actions using this architecture.
    Author:
    Travis Breaux
